channel.title: Dawntained | Pking Based | Bossing | Skilling
channel.description:
[URL=http://"dawntained.com"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gsHWTQ5.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://dawntained.com/index.php?board=4.0"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0wAkSLx.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://dawntained.com/index.php?board=5.0"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7hnGUJN.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://dawntained.com"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pX59faT.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"www.youtube.com/dawntained"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BniR9Eu.png[/img][/URL]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Dl3prFb.png[/img]
Preview of combat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EYaBL0a.png[/img] These images below are what you will come across when you first log in [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rAyCvtt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yZ1jBer.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cx2Kilj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kh2a3xd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/d0i4OzW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eMKE5gU.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eIzkX1jy8Ns[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i4r5rry.png[/img]
[ul][*]30 seconds to start hybrid pking [*]Combat on Dawntained is the best you will find [*]Chance of receiving up to 4 Artefacts if you kill a player, you can use these Artefacts to gain coins [*]Balanced player vs player combat, there are no OP items [*]New accounts are automatically given max combat, ability to change combat levels and a basic bank [*]Switching is smooth and no dragging [*]Exactly 1 minutes 30 seconds to gear up in hybrid gear from a new account [*]Player killing tracker which includes, kills, deaths, kill/death ratio, current killstreak, highest killstreak, safe kills and safe deaths [*]In game highscores for top Player Killers [*]Player killing teleports include Edgeville, Mage bank, East dragons, Hill giants multi and Safe pking [*]Achievement system, points earned from it can be used to buy Party hats, H'ween masks and various Dungeoneering items that have no item bonuses[/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PVWIWpo.png[/img]
[ul][*]13 bosses to battle for rare drops which include Dagannoth Kings, God Wars Dungeon bosses, Chaos Elemental, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demon, Ice Strykewyrm, Barrelchest and King Black Dragon [*]Slayer tasks, you are awarded a casket on completion, rewards from the casket can vary from trimmed armour to 3rd age items[/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PtxR815.png[/img]
[ul][*]Skilling island, where all non-combat skill training belongs [*]12 skills to max out including Mining, Smithing, Fishing, Cooking, Firemaking, Woodcutting, Farming, Herblore, Thieving, Crafting, Fletching and Runecrafting. [*]Completionist cape with its own unique emote awarded by an Npc upon achieving level 99 in all non-combat skills [*]Achievement points rewarded for each maxed out level, which can be used to buy rare items [*]Money making via skilling, obtain the resources such as ores, logs etc.. and sell them to a Npc, up to 15m/h for each skill[/ul]
[B]If you wish to support Dawntained, simply thank the thread <3[/B]

item.title: Dawntained | Pking Based | Bossing | Skilling
item.dc:creator: @MGT_Madness MGT Madness
item.description:
@MGT_Madness wrote:

Preview of combat

EYaBL0a.png763×503

These images below are what you will come across when you first log in
rAyCvtt.png766×503

yZ1jBer.png766×503

d0i4OzW.png766×503

eMKE5gU.png766×503

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eIzkX1jy8Ns[/youtube]

[ul][]30 seconds to start hybrid pking
[]Combat on Dawntained is the best you will find
[]Chance of receiving up to 4 Artefacts if you kill a player, you can use these Artefacts to gain coins
[]Balanced player vs player combat, there are no OP items
[]New accounts are automatically given max combat, ability to change combat levels and a basic bank
[]Switching is smooth and no dragging
[]Exactly 1 minutes 30 seconds to gear up in hybrid gear from a new account
[]Player killing tracker which includes, kills, deaths, kill/death ratio, current killstreak, highest killstreak, safe kills and safe deaths
[]In game highscores for top Player Killers
[]Player killing teleports include Edgeville, Mage bank, East dragons, Hill giants multi and Safe pking
[*]Achievement system, points earned from it can be used to buy Party hats, H’ween masks and various Dungeoneering items that have no item bonuses[/ul]

[ul][]13 bosses to battle for rare drops which include Dagannoth Kings, God Wars Dungeon bosses, Chaos
Elemental, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demon, Ice Strykewyrm, Barrelchest and King Black Dragon
[]Slayer tasks, you are awarded a casket on completion, rewards from the casket can vary from trimmed armour to 3rd age items[/ul]

[ul][]Skilling island, where all non-combat skill training belongs
[]12 skills to max out including Mining, Smithing, Fishing, Cooking, Firemaking, Woodcutting, Farming, Herblore, Thieving, Crafting, Fletching and Runecrafting.
[]Completionist cape with its own unique emote awarded by an Npc upon achieving level 99 in all non-combat skills
[]Achievement points rewarded for each maxed out level, which can be used to buy rare items
[*]Money making via skilling, obtain the resources such as ores, logs etc… and sell them to a Npc, up to 15m/h for each skill[/ul]

If you wish to support Dawntained, simply thank the thread <3
